item.title: Anthony Zurcher: Trump abandons attack mode as Minneapolis shooting backlash grows
item.description: The White House has shifted how it talks about Alex Pretti's killing as more Republicans express concern over the deadly encounter.

item.title: Treat Barron Trump account of alleged attack with caution, says judge
item.description: President Trump's youngest son told UK police he had seen a friend being attacked during a video call.

item.title: Bayern Munich open talks to extend Kane contract
item.description: Bayern Munich sporting director Max Eberl says the German club are in talks with Harry Kane about extending the striker's contract.

item.title: Beckhams seen together in Paris for first time since Brooklyn row
item.description: Sir David and Lady Beckham were seen with their children Romeo, Cruz and Harper.

item.title: New F1 cars 'look really cool' - Russell
item.description: McLaren and Red Bull release images of their 2026 Formula 1 cars as pre-season testing begins in Spain.
